name: Choveche
description:
A small game where you play as a slime ball, called Choveche, which tries to eat as many things as possible without freezing or getting fried :)

How to play:

  • Eat snails to gain mass and salt to lose mass
  • Mass affects size, movespeed and vulnerability to heat / cold (the bigger you are the more you suffer from heat and the less from cold, and vice versa)
  • Eating anything gives points
  • Difficulty and rewards increase as you play

Submission for Godot Community Game Jam - June 2018

Made with Godot 3.0.3

Source available here: https://github.com/CrowbarKZ/choveche
